decisions.name: Increasing average check size
decisions.description: AI analyzes staff performance with promotions and upselling. Timely feedback boosts sales effectiveness.

decisions.name: Service standards control
decisions.description: We give you confidence that every retail location in your company follows the same sales standards and aligns with corporate values.

decisions.name: Faster onboarding and training of new staff
decisions.description: Gideone provides personalized feedback that helps employees improve their performance. This enables learning right at the register and accelerates progress to the level of experienced colleagues.

decisions.name: Instant rollout of new promotions
decisions.description: As soon as a promotion launches, Gideone prompts staff to mention it. This helps prevent missed sales opportunities.

decisions.name: Reducing turnover and training costs
decisions.description: Training becomes more effective, and ‘mystery shoppers’ are no longer needed—your staff receives constant micro-coaching on the job.

decisions.name: Systematic motivation
decisions.description: Transparent KPI dashboards and gamification increase engagement and inspire staff to work more effectively.
